com.qtplaf.library.swing

Class EditContext

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.qtplaf.library.swing.EditContext

  • public class EditContext
extends java.lang.Object
    A context that contains the necessary items to edit a record field.
    Author:
    Miquel Sas

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private javax.swing.Action actionLookup
      A lookup action to be associated with theedit field.

      The alias of the field being edited.

      The edit field related to this context.
      private EditLabel editLabel
      The edit label related to this context.
      static java.lang.String FIELD_PREFIX
      Field prefix for edit field names created with the field alias.

      A boolean that indicates if this context will be used in a filter form.
      static java.lang.String LABEL_PREFIX
      Label prefix for edit label names created with the field alias.
      private Record record
      The record that is being edited.
      private boolean required
      A boolean that indicates if the edition of the related edit field is required.
      private Session session
      The working session.
      private java.util.List<javax.swing.Action> valueActions
      The list of actions that are triggered when the edited value changes.

    • Field Detail

      • LABEL_PREFIX

        public static final java.lang.String LABEL_PREFIX
        Label prefix for edit label names created with the field alias.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • FIELD_PREFIX

        public static final java.lang.String FIELD_PREFIX
        Field prefix for edit field names created with the field alias.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • record

        private Record record
        The record that is being edited.

      • alias

        private java.lang.String alias
        The alias of the field being edited.

      • valueActions

        private java.util.List<javax.swing.Action> valueActions
        The list of actions that are triggered when the edited value changes. The previous value, current value and this edit context are set in the action propoerties.

      • actionLookup

        private javax.swing.Action actionLookup
        A lookup action to be associated with theedit field. A lookup action will be used to retrieve the value for the current field or those related to the current edition, like a multi-value primary key.

      • editField

        private EditField editField
        The edit field related to this context.

      • editLabel

        private EditLabel editLabel
        The edit label related to this context.

      • required

        private boolean required
        A boolean that indicates if the edition of the related edit field is required. This overwrites the field required property.

      • filter

        private boolean filter
        A boolean that indicates if this context will be used in a filter form.

      • session

        private Session session
        The working session.

      • addValueAction

        public void addValueAction(javax.swing.Action action)
        Adds an action to the list of actions to be triggered when the associated component changes its value. When value actions are fired, the previous and the current value and this edit context are set as properties.
        Parameters:
        action - The value action.

      • removeValueAction

        public void removeValueAction(javax.swing.Action action)
        Removes the argument action from the list of value actions if it already is in.
        Parameters:
        action - The action to remove.

      • clearValueActions

        public void clearValueActions()
        Clear the list of value actions.

      • fireValueActions

        public void fireValueActions(java.awt.Component source,
                             Value previousValue,
                             Value currentValue)
        Fire value actions.
        Parameters:
        source - The source component.
        previousValue - The previous value.
        currentValue - The current value.

      • getActionLookup

        public javax.swing.Action getActionLookup()
        Returns the lookup action. The lookup action can come from the field or be build from a lookup relation.
        Returns:
        The lookup action.

      • setActionLookup

        public void setActionLookup(javax.swing.Action actionLookup)
